verses.verse: Then <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> to <S%H5804>Gaza<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> there an <S%H802>harlot<s%> <S%H2181><s%>, and went <S%H935>in<s%> unto her. harlot: Heb. a woman an harlot

And it was told the <S%H5841>Gazites<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8123>Samson<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> hither. And they compassed him <S%H5437>in<s%>, and laid <S%H693>wait<s%> for him all <S%H3915>night<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and were <S%H2790>quiet<s%> all the <S%H3915>night<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, In the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, when it is <S%H216>day<s%>, we shall <S%H2026>kill<s%> him. quiet: Heb. silent

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> till <S%H2677>midnight<s%> <S%H3915><s%>, and <S%H6965>arose<s%> at <S%H2677>midnight<s%> <S%H3915><s%>, and <S%H270>took<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4201>posts<s%>, and went <S%H5265>away<s%> with them, <S%H1280>bar<s%> and all, and <S%H7760>put<s%> them upon his <S%H3802>shoulders<s%>, and carried them <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of an <S%H2022>hill<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>. bar: Heb. with the bar

And it came to pass <S%H310>afterward<s%>, that he <S%H157>loved<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H7796>Sorek<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H1807>Delilah<s%>. in: or, by the brook

And the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> unto her, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, <S%H6601>Entice<s%> him, and <S%H7200>see<s%> wherein his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> lieth, and by what means we may <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against him, that we may <S%H631>bind<s%> him to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> him: and we will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee every <S%H376>one<s%> of us eleven <S%H505>hundred<s%> <S%H3967><s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%>. afflict: or, humble

And <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8123>Samson<s%>, <S%H5046>Tell<s%> me, I pray thee, wherein thy <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> lieth, and wherewith thou mightest be <S%H631>bound<s%> to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> thee.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, If they <S%H631>bind<s%> me with <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H3499>withs<s%> that were never <S%H2717>dried<s%>, then shall I be <S%H2470>weak<s%>, and be as <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H120>man<s%>. green: or, new cords: Heb. moist another: Heb. one

Then the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> to her <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H3499>withs<s%> which had not been <S%H2717>dried<s%>, and she <S%H631>bound<s%> him with them. green: or, new cords: Heb. moist

Now there were men lying in <S%H693>wait<s%>, <S%H3427>abiding<s%> with her in the <S%H2315>chamber<s%>. And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> be upon thee, <S%H8123>Samson<s%>. And he <S%H5423>brake<s%> the <S%H3499>withs<s%>, as a <S%H6616>thread<s%> of <S%H5296>tow<s%> is <S%H5423>broken<s%> when it <S%H7306>toucheth<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>. So his <S%H3581>strength<s%> was not <S%H3045>known<s%>. toucheth: Heb. smelleth

And <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8123>Samson<s%>, Behold, thou hast <S%H2048>mocked<s%> me, and <S%H1696>told<s%> me <S%H3577>lies<s%>: now <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, I pray thee, wherewith thou mightest be <S%H631>bound<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, If they <S%H631>bind<s%> me <S%H631>fast<s%> with <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5688>ropes<s%> that never were <S%H4399>occupied<s%> <S%H6213><s%>, then shall I be <S%H2470>weak<s%>, and be as <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H120>man<s%>. that never: Heb. wherewith work hath not been done

<S%H1807>Delilah<s%> therefore <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5688>ropes<s%>, and <S%H631>bound<s%> him therewith, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> be upon thee, <S%H8123>Samson<s%>. And there were liers in <S%H693>wait<s%> <S%H3427>abiding<s%> in the <S%H2315>chamber<s%>. And he <S%H5423>brake<s%> them from off his <S%H2220>arms<s%> like a <S%H2339>thread<s%>.

And <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8123>Samson<s%>, <S%H2008>Hitherto<s%> thou hast <S%H2048>mocked<s%> me, and <S%H1696>told<s%> me <S%H3577>lies<s%>: <S%H5046>tell<s%> me wherewith thou mightest be <S%H631>bound<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, If thou <S%H707>weavest<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4253>locks<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%> with the <S%H4545>web<s%>.

And she <S%H8628>fastened<s%> it with the <S%H3489>pin<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> be upon thee, <S%H8123>Samson<s%>. And he <S%H3364>awaked<s%> out of his <S%H8142>sleep<s%>, and went <S%H5265>away<s%> with the <S%H3489>pin<s%> of the <S%H708>beam<s%>, and with the <S%H4545>web<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H349>How<s%> canst thou <S%H559>say<s%>, I <S%H157>love<s%> thee, when thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> is not with me? thou hast <S%H2048>mocked<s%> me these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>, and hast not <S%H5046>told<s%> me wherein thy <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> lieth.

And it came to pass, when she <S%H6693>pressed<s%> him <S%H3117>daily<s%> with her <S%H1697>words<s%>, and <S%H509>urged<s%> him, so that his <S%H5315>soul<s%> was <S%H7114>vexed<s%> unto <S%H4191>death<s%>; vexed: Heb. shortened

That he <S%H5046>told<s%> her all his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, There hath not <S%H5927>come<s%> a <S%H4177>razor<s%> upon mine <S%H7218>head<s%>; for I have been a <S%H5139>Nazarite<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> from my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H990>womb<s%>: if I be <S%H1548>shaven<s%>, then my <S%H3581>strength<s%> will <S%H5493>go<s%> from me, and I shall become <S%H2470>weak<s%>, and be like any other <S%H120>man<s%>.

And when <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he had <S%H5046>told<s%> her all his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, she <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Come <S%H5927>up<s%> this <S%H6471>once<s%>, for he hath <S%H5046>shewed<s%> me all his <S%H3820>heart<s%>. Then the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> unto her, and <S%H5927>brought<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And she made him <S%H3462>sleep<s%> upon her <S%H1290>knees<s%>; and she <S%H7121>called<s%> for a <S%H376>man<s%>, and she caused him to shave <S%H1548>off<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4253>locks<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%>; and she <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> him, and his <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H5493>went<s%> from him.

And she <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> be upon thee, <S%H8123>Samson<s%>. And he <S%H3364>awoke<s%> out of his <S%H8142>sleep<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, I will go <S%H3318>out<s%> as at other times <S%H6471>before<s%>, and <S%H5287>shake<s%> myself. And he <S%H3045>wist<s%> not that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H5493>departed<s%> from him.

But the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H270>took<s%> him, and put <S%H5365>out<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and brought him <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H5804>Gaza<s%>, and <S%H631>bound<s%> him with fetters of <S%H5178>brass<s%>; and he did <S%H2912>grind<s%> in the <S%H631>prison<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>. put out: Heb. bored out
Howbeit the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to grow <S%H6779>again<s%> <S%H834>after<s%> he was <S%H1548>shaven<s%>. after: or, as when he was shaven

Then the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered them <S%H622>together<s%> for to <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> unto <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> their <S%H430>god<s%>, and to <S%H8057>rejoice<s%>: for they <S%H559>said<s%>, Our <S%H430>god<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> our <S%H341>enemy<s%> into our <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> him, they <S%H1984>praised<s%> their <S%H430>god<s%>: for they <S%H559>said<s%>, Our <S%H430>god<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into our <S%H3027>hands<s%> our <S%H341>enemy<s%>, and the <S%H2717>destroyer<s%> of our <S%H776>country<s%>, which <S%H2491>slew<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> of us. which: Heb. and who multiplied our slain

And it came to pass, when their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> were <S%H2896>merry<s%>, that they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7121>Call<s%> for <S%H8123>Samson<s%>, that he may make us <S%H7832>sport<s%>. And they <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H8123>Samson<s%> out of the <S%H631>prison<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>; and he made <S%H6440>them<s%> <S%H6711>sport<s%>: and they <S%H5975>set<s%> him between the <S%H5982>pillars<s%>. them: Heb. before them

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5288>lad<s%> that <S%H2388>held<s%> him by the <S%H3027>hand<s%>, <S%H3240>Suffer<s%> me that I may <S%H4184>feel<s%> <S%H3237><s%> the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> whereupon the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3559>standeth<s%>, that I may <S%H8172>lean<s%> upon them.

Now the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%> and <S%H802>women<s%>; and all the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were there; and there were upon the <S%H1406>roof<s%> about <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women<s%>, that <S%H7200>beheld<s%> while <S%H8123>Samson<s%> made <S%H7832>sport<s%>.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, <S%H2142>remember<s%> me, I pray thee, and <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> me, I pray thee, only this <S%H6471>once<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, that I may be at <S%H259>once<s%> <S%H5358>avenged<s%> <S%H5359><s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> for my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> took <S%H3943>hold<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8432>middle<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> upon which the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3559>stood<s%>, and on which it was borne <S%H5564>up<s%>, of the <S%H259>one<s%> with his right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and of the <S%H259>other<s%> with his <S%H8040>left<s%>. on which: or, he leaned on them

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let me <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H5315><s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>. And he <S%H5186>bowed<s%> himself with all his <S%H3581>might<s%>; and the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon the <S%H5633>lords<s%>, and upon all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were therein. So the <S%H4191>dead<s%> which he <S%H4191>slew<s%> at his <S%H4194>death<s%> were <S%H7227>more<s%> than they which he <S%H4191>slew<s%> in his <S%H2416>life<s%>. me: Heb. my soul

Then his <S%H251>brethren<s%> and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%>, and <S%H5375>took<s%> him, and brought him <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him between <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and <S%H847>Eshtaol<s%> in the <S%H6913>buryingplace<s%> of <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>. And he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.
